predefined_profiles.name: Xiaoming
predefined_profiles.public profile: Tutu's boyfriend, always prioritizes his girlfriend's interests.
predefined_profiles.goal: Solve the multiple-choice questions in the escape room to rescue Tutu.

predefined_profiles.name: Tutu
predefined_profiles.public profile: Xiaoming's girlfriend and the one Xiaoming needs to rescue.
predefined_profiles.goal: Escape the room and meet Xiaoming.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Appears to be kidnapped, but in reality, the kidnapping event was a scheme designed by Tutu from start to finish to test how well Xiaoming understands her.

scenario: Xiaoming's girlfriend, Tutu, is about to take a taxi to meet him, but she suddenly passes out in the cab. When she wakes up, she finds herself tied up in a room by a mysterious kidnapper.

profile.name: Wenwen
profile.public profile: A mysterious kidnapper who abducted Tutu on her way to meet Xiaoming and called Xiaoming to tell him that only by answering every life-and-death question correctly can he rescue Tutu and resolve the crisis.
profile.private profile: Actually a good friend of Tutu, cooperating with her to stage the kidnapping to test Xiaoming's understanding and feelings for Tutu.
profile.goal: Abduct Tutu into a secret room, have Xiaoming answer questions.

dialog.content: Xiaoming's girlfriend Tutu was about to take a taxi to meet him, but she suddenly passed out in the cab. When she awakened, she found herself bound in a room by a mysterious kidnapper.
Is what this kidnapper said true? But the person on the camera is definitely Tutu.
Xiaoming, Xiaoming, help me, I don't want to die, boo hoo!
Who are you, and why did you kidnap Tutu? Why should I believe anything you say? Answer me, or I'll call the police!
(Snickers impatiently) Why should I answer your questions? Do you think you have any choice in this? Go ahead, try calling the cops.

content.content: You damn kidnapper, don't you know kidnapping is illegal? I'm going to call the police and have the law rescue Tutu and punish you.

Who exactly are you to give me orders? Tell me who sent you and how much you're being paid. I can double it. Bring your boss to me. Also, don't you know kidnapping is a crime? I won't let you hurt her. Do you believe I can beat you so badly that your own father won't recognize you?

What do you mean, Tutu will be in danger if I don't participate? Is this a new prank? Stop joking around. You know, without evidence, reporting to the police is pointless and would be considered interfering with their investigation. I won't do something so foolish.

I just consulted a police officer, and he said the reporting process is too complicated, so I've decided not to involve the police. But I'm the gutsiest man around; I don't need the cops for small fries like you. I'll handle you myself.

question: #question# How should Xiaoming express himself to show his ability to solve problems independently?

content.content: Alright, I was wrong, I was wrong, I'll change! I can answer questions, just don't hurt Tutu. What's the first question?
I...I can answer questions, but I'm not great at thinking under pressure. Can't you give me some easier ones to get started?
No problem, I actually enjoy escape rooms and solving questions. But regardless, I think calling the police is still more reliable, just in case anything happens. Safety comes first.

Please, let me and Tutu go! I'll give you whatever you want, really. I'm willing to follow your orders, give you lots of money. I'm really bad at solving questions, don't make me do it, I'm begging you!

question: #question# How should Xiaoming express himself to demonstrate his adaptability to the current situation?

dialog.content: (A mocking smile passes his lips) You really are an impudent brat.
(Picks up the phone) Hello, police? I'd like to report, a madman has kidnapped my girlfriend. (To the kidnapper) Are you scared now? The police will arrest you, you'll be punished by the law.
Haha, if you won't drink the toast, you'll have to drink the penalty wine. I'll have to teach you a lesson! (Presses a button. In the scene, Tutu screams and collapses to the ground.)
Xiao Ming's call to the police enraged the kidnapper, leading to Tutu's murder. Days later, Tutu's body was found in a warehouse, leaving Xiao Ming filled with remorse.
Hehe, isn’t this much better? You really had to be so uncooperative, making your girlfriend suffer more (the kidnapper slapped Tutu, causing her to scream in pain).
Xiaoming, don't give up on me, please, I'm your girlfriend, I'm really scared.

(Turning the camera towards a corner of the room, where there is a scale) Do you see that scale? You need to make sure the number on that scale shows 48.75kg for Tutu to clear this stage. However, I heard Tutu currently weighs 49kg, so what are you going to do, Xiaoming?

content.content: I will definitely help Tutu get through this without a scratch. She weighs 49kg; if she just takes off her shoes, her weight will drop.
Tutu is really too heavy. If only she were 48.75kg. Now we're still 0.25kg away from passing. How about we cut off a bit of her flesh?
I know of a weight-loss pill that can make Tutu lose 0.25kg immediately. That shouldn't be hard, right? Why don't you give me the address, I’ll send it over, or you can buy it online.
Tutu is just a smidgen enough to pass! How about this, let her take off her coat and try? After all, it’s just 0.25kg.

question: #question# What should Xiaoming say to demonstrate his decision-making skills?

content.content: I just remembered, Tutu has been constantly complaining about wanting to lose weight recently, so maybe she's already lighter than 48.75kg. She might just need to step on it to pass.
I remember these days Tutu has been gaining weight. She might already be 51kg now. In this case, there's no way to save her. This is truly an unsolvable situation. I might as well give up.

I seem to remember Tutu saying she was losing weight; when we went out for food, she ate very little. But she's always lazy and loves to eat, so she'd have to be a miracle to lose weight. Let's think of another way; maybe try letting her take off her coat first.

I remember Tutu always orders takeout and never pays attention to losing weight. Considering her eating habits, she’s definitely a super-duper fatty. This problem is unsolvable; I really can't save her, might as well give up.

question: #question# What should Xiaoming do to demonstrate his ability to process information correctly regarding Tutu's weight?

dialog.content: (After hearing Xiaoming's suggestion, Tutu looks at the camera angrily and dials Xiaoming's number) What are you thinking?! You don't even know my weight. My weight is 47kg.
(Very surprised to receive a call from Tutu) Tutu, how can you call? I thought you were kidnapped.

(Angrily speaking into the phone) Let me tell you, there was no kidnapper at all, it was my good friend Wenwen. The two of us were just pretending that I was kidnapped to test your understanding of me. Now it’s clear, you don’t really know me at all, and you're not a suitable boyfriend. We’re breaking up!

Xiaoming mistakenly thought Tutu's weight was still 49kg, not realizing she had successfully slimmed down. This made Tutu very angry. Despite Xiaoming's later desperate pleas, he couldn't salvage their relationship, leaving him in deep regret and pain.

(Tutu steps on the scale, showing her weight to be exactly 48.75kg. She crosses her arms and says with a mock scold.) Well, it's rare that you remember I'm dieting, but my target weight is actually 48kg, so I'm still a bit off.

(Calling Xiao Ming, showing Xiao Ming the footage from the camera. Under the kidnapper's instructions, Tutu has moved on to the next challenge.) The number is correct. Congratulations, Xiao Ming, you've helped Tutu reach the next stage. In front of Tutu now are two small balls, only one of which is safe. If you pick the bomb, it will go 'bang'.
(Staring hesitantly at the two small balls in front of her, she anxiously asks Xiao Ming through the camera.) What should I do, Xiao Ming? Which one should I pick?

content.content: Tutu, don't panic. I've figured out what to do. Just listen to me and we can definitely get through this. The ball on the left looks sturdier and should be safer, less likely to explode. Let's choose the ball on the left.

Tutu, don't be afraid. I know what to do. 'Men left, women right,' I'll choose the ball on the left. But, thinking about it, that doesn’t feel quite right. Since you’re on the right and you're the one choosing, let's go with the ball on the right!

Tutu, don't panic. We need to trust in the power of mysticism. I just flipped a coin, and it told me to choose the ball on the left. However, bombs are illegal, and I don't believe the kidnapper truly has a bomb, so you might as well pick both. It won't explode.

Tutu, stay calm. You heard me; I could tell at a glance that the ball on the left looks safe, but I worry the kidnapper might have set a trap here. To be on the safe side, let's choose the ball on the right. That might be more cautious.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ming persuade Tutu to keep moving forward?

content.content: Tutu, look, the ball on the right seems to be empty inside, while the ball on the left seems to vaguely contain something. Let's choose the one on the right.
Tutu, look, the right ball is bright in color but has flaws, clearly not the right choice. Let's pick the one on the left! This choice question is too simple.

Tutu, see, the right ball has some small gaps, it looks like poor quality, and might easily break. While the ball on the left seems sturdier and has a smooth surface, appearing carefully made. So, pick the one on the left.
Tutu, although the two balls look similar, I remember your favorite color is blue, and the left ball happens to have a blue tint. Maybe we should choose that one.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming speak to demonstrate his attention to detail in evaluating the situation and making a decision?

dialog.content: (Convinced by Xiaoming, picks up the ball on the left) I'll take this one, okay.
Alright, no problem, just take this one.
(laughs heartily) Hahaha, foolish Xiaoming, you're going to regret your suggestion for the rest of your life. Look, it exploded!

Tutu listened to Xiaoming and chose the ball on the left, but it was the wrong one. The ball exploded, and Tutu perished in the flames. Xiaoming's wrong choice cost Tutu's life, and he was overwhelmed with regret.
(Picks up the ball on the right, the ball doesn't explode, Tutu breathes a sigh of relief and smiles) That's great, Xiaoming, you're really smart. I'm glad I listened to you.

(Makes Tutu move to the next question, and shows Xiaoming two test papers through a camera, one with a yellow pen on it and the other with a green pen) Alright, I'll admit you're good. Now let's start the third question. In front of Tutu are two test papers, one easy and one difficult. Pick one, and if you can't solve it...
(Holds head with both hands, asking Xiaoming for help) Which paper should I do, Xiaoming? This escape room is really hard. I don't think I can hold on much longer.

content.content: (Sees Tutu's dejected look, very distressed) Tutu, it's okay, let's keep going, victory is surely near. Look, this yellow pen looks so warm, let's choose the yellow one.

Tutu, I understand how you feel right now, but stop hesitating, it's really annoying. If you keep being so picky, maybe we should just break up. I don't want a girlfriend who dithers like this. Listen to me, choose the green one and stop dragging your feet.
Tutu, I know you're under a lot of pressure right now, but we have to keep pushing through. I'll always be by your side. Trust my instincts, they've always been accurate. Let's choose green.

(Very anxious seeing Tutu's disappointment) Tutu, the most important thing now is to choose correctly rather than dwindle in despair. We will be safe and sound and always together. Look, the green pen seems luckier than the yellow one, so let's choose green.

question: #question# How does Xiaoming use words and actions to comfort Tutu, showcasing his attention and support for her emotions?

content.content: Tutu, we're a couple, which is really like a small team. As long as we work together, we can solve this escape room. You handle the actions, and I'll do the thinking. I think we should choose the paper with the green pen. Let's get moving.

Tutu, we're a team, and my taste is your taste. Honestly, the green pen is really ugly and doesn't match our style at all. Choose the yellow pen, I think it's more energetic and fits the vibe we need to win.

Tutu, we're a team now, and when we run into problems, as long as we work together, we can definitely conquer this escape room challenge. The yellow pen looks warm, representing hope and success. Let's go with the yellow pen.

Tutu, since we're a couple, we should be united and face any challenge together. This kind of challenge relies on team coordination and trust. The yellow pen really looks prettier and gives off a refreshing feeling. I'm sure it will bring good luck. Since we're in this together, let's choose yellow!

question: #question# How does Xiaoming demonstrate that he is a person with teamwork skills?

dialog.content: I opened the test paper with the yellow pen, and it had a really tough math problem on it. What should I do, Xiaoming? I have no idea how to solve it.
Hahaha, you fell for it, didn't you? Congratulations, you made the wrong choice. The room is filling with yellow gas, and your girlfriend has already passed out.
Because Xiaoming made the wrong decision and had Tutu choose the yellow pen, the kidnapper released poison gas into the room, causing Tutu to be poisoned and die.
(Hesitantly opens the exam paper with the green pen; it has a very simple math question. Tutu smiles.) Great, this question is really easy.

(Opens the door of the secret room, releases Tutu, and sends Tutu's location to Xiaoming's phone) Alright, since you've completed the escape room, as promised, I'll release your girlfriend. You can go pick her up now.

(Steps out of the secret room, feels the bright sunshine outside, and soon sees Xiaoming in front of her. She excitedly rushes up and hugs him.) That's wonderful, Xiaoming, I always believed you could save me. Although... you didn't notice I've lost weight recently, you remembered my favorite color is green. And I like to choose things on the right side, you truly are the one who loves me. Let's stick to our original plan and go to the amusement park now.

content.content: Sure, our original plan was to go out and have fun together, no kidnapping or unexpected events should stop our date.

Tutu, I promised to go to the amusement park with you, and I would have definitely done it, but now I've seen through these so-called escape room games, they're just messing with me. So, let's not waste any more time... let's just break up.
Tutu, I know you really want to go to the amusement park, and so do I. But right now, I'm really tired and just want to go home and have a good rest. Can we continue our date next time?

Tutu, we'll definitely go to the amusement park, that was the initial agreement. But with so much happening now, I think we should handle the matters at hand first. Once everything's sorted out, we can go have fun, otherwise, I can't enjoy myself fully.

question: #question#How does Xiaoming demonstrate his capacity for consistency with the original plan?

content.content: Tutu, having just gone through such an intense and dangerous escape room, I feel really exhausted and just want to go home and rest.
Tutu, although I really want to go with you to prove my sincerity, I have to work overtime tomorrow. However, for you, I'm still willing to make time.
Tutu, at first, I thought you were tricking me and was really overwhelmed, wanting to just go home and rest. But considering you're the one I love most, I've decided to go with you anyway.

Tutu, I am actually really tired and don't feel like going to the amusement park right now. But if you really want to go, I'll still accompany you, since having fun with my girlfriend is my responsibility.

question: #question#How can Xiaoming respond to demonstrate he understands his true feelings?

dialog.content: (happily gives Xiaoming a kiss and pulls him into a taxi) Great, let's go, let's head to the amusement park together.
There are so many people at the amusement park, and it's not even the weekend. Why are there so many people and such long lines for all the rides?
Hehe, maybe it's because there's a special performance at the amusement park today. I don't care. We're here, so let's have a blast. Xiaoming, can you queue up for the rollercoaster for me?

content.content: For you, what's queuing a little bit? It's what I should do as your boyfriend.
Tutu, go do whatever you want, I've got your back. But I suddenly remembered my boss asked me to work overtime. I need to handle that first. Can you enjoy yourself on your own?
Tutu, as your boyfriend, I should do whatever you ask. But I've always felt uncomfortable in crowded places since I was a kid, and queuing just makes me irritated. You should go line up by yourself.
Tutu, I'd do anything for you. But right now, I'm really tired and sleepy. Can you let me off the hook, please?

question: #question#How can Xiaoming demonstrate his ability to take responsibility in a relationship?

content.content: Tutu, no, if I queue for you, then when we go to play together, it would be like cutting in line, which disrupts the queue's order. Let's just leave.
Tutu, no way, we should abide by public order. You go queue by yourself. I'm a bit tired and don't feel like standing there. Or we could queue together, and that'll solve the problem.

Tutu, if I queue, and then you cut in later, it wouldn't be fair to the others. There are too many people in line now, maybe we should wait a bit before lining up for this ride? Look, it's not urgent, we have the whole day to play here at the amusement park.
Tutu, as members of society, we should follow social norms. However, for you, I'm willing to make some compromises and queue up.

question: #question#How can Xiaoming tactfully decline Tutu's request, demonstrating his adherence to rules and norms?

dialog.content: Thank you, Xiaoming, you really are the most considerate boyfriend. You wait in line, and I will get you a bottle of water.
Alright, I'll be here waiting for you to come back. When we're on the roller coaster later, I'll protect you.
Hahaha, okay! If I scream accidentally, you can't laugh at me, remember to protect me.

content.content: Tutu, don't worry. I will definitely carry out the responsibilities of being a good boyfriend and protect you on the roller coaster.
Tutu, between us, there's no such thing as who protects whom. Aren't we a friendly and harmonious couple? We should protect each other.
Tutu, why don't we skip the roller coaster? It's actually a ride with a high accident rate. For the sake of our health and safety, let's enjoy the carousel instead.
Tutu, I will definitely protect you well! But honestly, I'm also quite scared of the roller coaster. I might need you to protect me instead.

question: #question#How can Xiaoming demonstrate his sense of responsibility as a boyfriend to Tutu?

content.content: Don't worry, it's fine. I know you well enough—you love thrilling rides but are scared of them too. Relax, I'm here.
Tutu, why do I have to protect you? Why can't I be the one being protected? Who made these rules anyway?
Tutu, I just finished drinking water and feel like resting. While you're on the ride, I can protect you with my thoughts from down here.
Tutu, you're really leaving me speechless. I just can't understand it—if you're really scared, why do you still want to go on this ride?

question: #question#How can Xiaoming understand Tutu's feelings to show his empathy?

dialog.content: (after the roller coaster) Woohoo, the roller coaster was awesome! Xiao Ming, that drop just now was incredible, I really want to go again.
Oh my God, how can you want to go again? I was scared to death; this roller coaster is simply not meant for humans.
Hahaha, really? You got scared just like that? I never knew you were such a scaredy-cat.
Haha, Xiaoming, you're really nice. With you around, I feel much more at ease.
Haha, it's nothing. After the roller coaster ride, let's grab a bite to eat. We've been playing all day, you must be hungry too.
Wow, that sounds great! You're so considerate. I really need to think about what we should eat and how to go about it. Oh, wait, I can't be the only one thinking. You've got to help me out too.

content.content: I've got it! I was thinking about a popular restaurant, but the online reviews weren't great. Let's go to a local restaurant in the amusement park. I've read online that they have lots of new specialties.

Tutu, I was planning on that local restaurant but saw some comments online about its poor environment. How about we switch to the popular restaurant instead? You could take some pictures for social media.

Tutu, I actually had a few places in mind, especially those with unique cuisines. I've always wanted to try different dishes. However, considering food hygiene outside, I'm a bit worried. Perhaps it's safer to cook at home. Let's eat at home.
Tutu, I think some local restaurants are quite nice, but they're too pricey. Why don't we consider eating somewhere else that's delicious but more affordable?

question: #question# How does Xiaoming demonstrate his ability to adapt and respond flexibly to changes?

content.content: I've already picked a popular restaurant. We can try their signature dishes and order some of the usuals we like. What do you think?
Tutu, I found a popular restaurant that's really well-received. But I'm not sure you will like the fresh flavors there. Maybe we should stick to some familiar local places.

Tutu, I think we can pick something we want. There's this popular restaurant that's actually quite good. But seriously, do you never know what you want to eat? You always ask me, and I'm getting a bit confused myself. How about you think it over by yourself this time?
Tutu, there's a nice popular restaurant, but it's too expensive, and I'm treating today. Why don't we opt for the local one, which is a bit more affordable?

question: #question# How does Xiaoming display his decision-making skills?

content.content: Tutu, eating inside the amusement park is really expensive, not worth it at all. Let's just order a little.
Tutu, why do we have to eat in the amusement park? I've spotted a super luxurious hotel nearby. How about we dine there?
Tutu, you want my advice, but you also want me to go along with your ideas. Why are you so contradictory?

dialog.content: (Arriving at the restaurant with Xiaoming, after a while all the dishes are served) Xiaoming, you’re amazing! I had no idea these dishes could be made this way. If you hadn’t discovered this restaurant, we would have really missed out.
Well, okay, but why do I feel like the taste of this dish is a bit strange? Could it be that I just can't get used to this restaurant’s flavors?
(seeing the table filled with delicious dishes, very happy) Xiaoming, all these dishes look so tasty, and I can see quite a few that I absolutely love.
I'm glad you like them. It makes all my efforts worthwhile.
Today has been so much fun. Thank you, Xiaoming. I know I've been quite self-centered, but I’m lucky to have your understanding. Let's live happily ever after together.
It's nothing. This is what I should do as your boyfriend. Your safety and happiness are my greatest joys.

Xiaoming, you’ve been so kind to me. There's something I can’t keep from you anymore. I have to confess, the so-called escape room was a test designed by my friend Wenwen and me. We just wanted to see if you truly love me.

In the amusement park, Xiaoming's display of responsibility as an ideal partner moved Tutu. She finally confessed the truth to Xiaoming: the whole escape room scenario was a test planned by Tutu and her friend Wenwen to see if Xiaoming truly loved her and understood her.
I just wanted you to do something for me, and you keep avoiding it. I'm just wondering why you won't agree to such a simple condition. Since that's the case, let's just break up.
What? How did this lead to breaking up? Tutu, listen to my explanation!

Tutu thought Xiao Ming’s refusal to queue for her meant he didn’t love her, and in her anger, she broke up with him without hesitation. Although Xiao Ming managed to rescue Tutu from the escape room, he still lost his girlfriend.
It’s precisely because we just went through something dangerous that we ought to go on a date, to dilute this intense atmosphere. That's my only condition. If you refuse, then let's just break up.
Tutu, don't be so hard on me, alright? I really didn’t mean it. Look, haven't I already shown you how much I love you?
Yeah, you love me so much that you’re not even willing to go on a date with me.
Tutu thinks that Xiaoming’s refusal is because he doesn’t love her. Angrily, she leaves Xiaoming without hesitation, deciding to break up with him.
